title: There’s Now a Spa Specifically for Pampering Babies
text: Photo: Baby Spa Perth More Everyone knows it’s never too late for wellness. But a new spa in Australia is teaching clients that it’s also never too early. According to Huffington Post , Baby Spa Perth is providing spa treatments to babies from six days young to six months old. The spa specializes in hydrotherapy treatments that provide “bonding” opportunities for parent and baby. According to the spa’s website, the water creates a womb-like feel which promotes relaxation. It also promotes some very cute photos of babies in teeny tiny inner tubes. Sessions are $85 for 45 minutes and include an “infant massage.” One testimonial claims that the massage session helped her baby sleep, which is an added bonus for any new family. “I found Austin slept much better after a session and is now a very confident little baby in any water environment. Its also a great way to bond with your little one and pick up massage techniques to try at home,” wrote new mom Rebecca Marsh. Baby Spa Perth is the second location of a franchise that started in Australia. Who wants to take bets on just how soon we can expect one of these in Brooklyn? Read more from Yahoo Style + Beauty:
